titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I presided at a meeting of Chapter. A sum of £100 was voted for the better arrangement of the documents in the Treasury. Of this half was to be paid to M

Hardy of the Record Office as an honorarium, and half to be placed at his disposal for the payment of a competent clerk. After lunch I shewed a party of 40 members of the Armstrong College Historical Society over the Cathedral and Deanery. Then I attended Evensong, &, later, walked for an hour with Watson.
Hugh Lyon arrived for the week end
